pli-tv-kd15:8.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa mahagghassa candanassa candanagaṇṭhi uppannā hoti.

pli-tv-kd15:8.1.5_0: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhi tāya candanagaṇṭhiyā pattaṁ lekhāpetvā sikkāya uḍḍitvā veḷagge ālaggetvā veḷuparamparāya bandhitvā evamāha—
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.6_0: “yo samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā arahā ceva iddhimā ca dinnaṁyeva pattaṁ oharatū”ti.

pli-tv-kd15:8.1.9_1: āyasmā arahā ceva iddhimā ca dinnaṁyeva pattaṁ oharatū”ti.

pli-tv-kd15:8.1.25_0: Atha kho āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo vehāsaṁ abbhuggantvā taṁ pattaṁ gahetvā tikkhattuṁ rājagahaṁ anupariyāyi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.26_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahako seṭṭhi saputtadāro sake nivesane ṭhito hoti pañjaliko namassamāno—
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.28_0: Atha kho āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa nivesane patiṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.29_0: Atha kho rājagahako seṭṭhi āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa hatthato pattaṁ gahetvā mahagghassa khādanīyassa pūretvā āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa adāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.1.30_0: Atha kho āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo taṁ pattaṁ gahetvā ārāmaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.2_0: ayyena kira piṇḍolabhāradvājena rājagahakassa seṭṭhissa patto ohāritoti.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.3_0: Te ca manussā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā āyasmantaṁ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd15:8.2.6_0: “kiṁ nu kho so, ānanda, uccāsaddo mahāsaddo”ti?

pli-tv-kd15:11.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tattha tattha khilaṁ nikkhaṇitvā sambandhitvā cīvaraṁ sibbenti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.3.4_1: kathinaṁ kathinarajjuṁ tattha tattha obandhitvā cīvaraṁ sibbetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.3.15_1: daṇḍakathinaṁ bidalakaṁ salākaṁ vinandhanarajjuṁ vinandhanasuttaṁ vinandhitvā cīvaraṁ sibbetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi kathinaṁ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.4.6_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū allehi pādehi kathinaṁ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.4.11_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saupāhanā kathinaṁ akkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaraṁ sibbantā aṅguliyā paṭiggaṇhanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.5.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace paṭiggahe dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṁ rūpiyamayaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:11.5.13_0: Tena kho pana samayena sūciyopi satthakāpi paṭiggahāpi nassanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū abbhokāse cīvaraṁ sibbantā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.6.17_0: setavaṇṇaṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ gerukaparikammaṁ mālākammaṁ latākammaṁ makaradantakaṁ pañcapaṭikaṁ cīvaravaṁsaṁ cīvararajjukan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:11.7.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaraṁ sibbetvā tattheva kathinaṁ ujjhitvā pakkamanti,
pli-tv-kd15:11.7.8_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kuṭṭepi thambhepi kathinaṁ ussāpetvā pakkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sūcikampi satthakampi bhesajjampi pattena ādāya gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.7_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu upāhanāyo kāyabandhanena bandhitvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.8_0: Aññataro upāsako taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādento upāhanāyo sīsena ghaṭṭeti.
pli-tv-kd15:12.1.10_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:13.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena antarāmagge udakaṁ akappiyaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū kosalesu janapade addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.7_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu pipāsāya pīḷito upanaddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.11_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.14_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.15_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu parissāvanaṁ yāciyamāno na dassatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.16_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.17_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.26_1: addhānamaggappaṭipannena bhikkhunā parissāvanaṁ yāciyamānena na dātabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:13.2.30_0: Sace na hoti parissāvanaṁ vā dhammakaraṇo vā,
pli-tv-kd15:13.3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd15:13.3.2_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:13.3.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:13.3.10_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū makasehi ubbāḷhā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṁ paṇītānaṁ bhattānaṁ bhattapaṭipāṭi aṭṭhitā hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.2_0: Bhikkhū paṇītāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā abhisannakāyā honti bahvābādhā.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.3_0: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco vesāliṁ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.4_0: Addasā kho jīvako komārabhacco bhikkhū abhisannakāye bahvābādhe.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.6_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.10_0: Atha kho bhagavā jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.11_0: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:14.1.12_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:14.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū visame caṅkame caṅkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.2.16_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū caṅkame caṅkamantā paripatanti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.2.19_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse caṅkamantā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.2.24_0: setavaṇṇaṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ gerukaparikammaṁ mālākammaṁ latākammaṁ makaradantakaṁ pañcapaṭikaṁ cīvaravaṁsaṁ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.12_1: kavāṭaṁ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṁ udukkhalikaṁ uttarapāsakaṁ aggaḷavaṭṭiṁ kapisīsakaṁ sūcikaṁ ghaṭikaṁ tāḷacchiddaṁ āviñchanachiddaṁ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.17_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū khuddake jantāghare majjhe aggiṭṭhānaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.20_1: khuddake jantāghare ekamantaṁ aggiṭṭhānaṁ kātuṁ, mahallake majjhe”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.40_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū jantāghare chamāya nisīdanti, gattāni kaṇḍūvanti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.3.43_0: Tena kho pana samayena jantāgharaṁ aparikkhittaṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:14.4.14_1: kavāṭaṁ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṁ udukkhalikaṁ uttarapāsakaṁ aggaḷavaṭṭiṁ kapisīsakaṁ sūcikaṁ ghaṭikaṁ tāḷacchiddaṁ āviñchanachiddaṁ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:14.4.17_0: setavaṇṇaṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ gerukaparikammaṁ mālākammaṁ latākammaṁ makaradantakaṁ pañcapaṭikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:15.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū naggā naggaṁ abhivādenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:15.1.2_2: naggā naggassa parikammaṁ kārāpenti, naggā naggassa denti, naggā paṭiggaṇhanti, naggā khādanti, naggā bhuñjanti, naggā sāyanti, naggā pivanti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū jantāghare chamāya cīvaraṁ nikkhipanti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū jantāgharepi udakepi parikammaṁ kātuṁ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena jantāghare udakaṁ na hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.17_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū vallikāyapi kāyabandhanenapi udakaṁ vāhenti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.25_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse udakaṁ vāhentā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:16.2.30_0: setavaṇṇaṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ gerukaparikammaṁ mālākammaṁ latākammaṁ makaradantakaṁ pañcapaṭikaṁ cīvaravaṁsaṁ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:17.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ārāme tahaṁ tahaṁ nahāyanti.
pli-tv-kd15:17.1.14_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṁ gattāni sītigatāni honti.
pli-tv-kd15:17.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako saṅghassa atthāya pokkharaṇiṁ kāretukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:17.2.14_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu saṅghassa atthāya nillekhaṁ jantāgharaṁ kattukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cātumāsaṁ nisīdanena vippavasanti.
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pupphābhikiṇṇesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.6_0: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:18.1.11_0: Tena kho pana samayena manussā gandhampi mālampi ādāya ārāmaṁ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-kd15:19.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa namatakaṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:19.1.7_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū āsittakūpadhāne bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-kd15:19.1.13_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:19.1.14_0: So bhuñjamāno na sakkoti hatthena pattaṁ sandhāretuṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:19.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:19.2.2_0: ekathālakepi pivanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti,
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena vaḍḍho licchavī mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sahāyo hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.2_0: Atha kho vaḍḍho licchavī yena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.5_0: Dutiyampi kho vaḍḍho licchavī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.8_0: Tatiyampi kho vaḍḍho licchavī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.11_0: “Kyāhaṁ ayyānaṁ aparajjhāmi, kissa maṁ ayyā nālapantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.14_1: ajjeva bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāsāpeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.15_0: “Kyāhaṁ, ayyā, karomi, kiṁ mayā sakkā kātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.16_0: “Ehi tvaṁ, āvuso vaḍḍha, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama,
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.18_1: disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṁ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd15:20.1.21_0: ayyena me dabbena mallaputtena pajāpati dūsitā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.1_1: ayyā”ti kho vaḍḍho licchavī mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vaḍḍho licchavī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.4_1: disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṁ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.7_0: ayyena me dabbena mallaputtena pajāpati dūsitā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.8_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.12_0: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.2.18_1: jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.3.2_1: saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṁ nikkujjatu, asambhogaṁ saṅghena karotu.
pli-tv-kd15:20.3.4_3: bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati, bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedeti, buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati.
pli-tv-kd15:20.3.5_1: imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa pattaṁ nikkujjituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:20.4.4_0: Vaḍḍho licchavī āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.4.5_1: saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṁ nikkujjeyya, asambhogaṁ saṅghena kareyya.
pli-tv-kd15:20.4.8_0: Vaḍḍho licchavī āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.4.9_0: Saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṁ nikkujjati, asambhogaṁ saṅghena karoti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.4.10_0: Yassāyasmato khamati vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattassa nikkujjanā, asambhogaṁ saṅghena karaṇaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd15:20.4.12_0: Nikkujjito saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto, asambhogo saṅghena.
pli-tv-kd15:20.4.13_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.5_0: saṅghena kira me patto nikkujjito, asambhogomhi kira saṅghenāti—
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.7_0: Atha kho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā vaḍḍhaṁ licchaviṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.8_0: “alaṁ, āvuso vaḍḍha, mā soci, mā paridevi.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.10_0: Atha kho vaḍḍho licchavī saputtadāro samittāmacco sañātisālohito allavattho allakeso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.10_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.11_2: yohaṁ ayyaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsesiṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.12_1: bhagavā accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.13_2: yaṁ tvaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.14_0: Yato ca kho tvaṁ, āvuso vaḍḍha,
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.14_1: accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikarosi, taṁ te mayaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma.
pli-tv-kd15:20.5.15_1: ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti, āyatiṁ saṁvaraṁ āpajjatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.6.2_1: saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṁ ukkujjatu, sambhogaṁ saṅghena karotu.
pli-tv-kd15:20.6.4_6: na dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, na saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati.
pli-tv-kd15:20.6.5_1: imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa pattaṁ ukkujjituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.2_1: vaḍḍhena licchavinā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.3_0: ‘saṅghena me, bhante, patto nikkujjito, asambhogomhi saṅghena.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.4_0: Sohaṁ, bhante, sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi,
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.9_0: Saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto nikkujjito, asambhogo saṅghena.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.10_0: So sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.11_1: saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṁ ukkujjeyya, sambhogaṁ saṅghena kareyya.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.14_0: Saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto nikkujjito, asambhogo saṅghena.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.15_0: So sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.16_0: Saṅgho vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattaṁ ukkujjati, sambhogaṁ saṅghena karoti.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.17_0: Yassāyasmato khamati vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattassa ukkujjanā, sambhogaṁ saṅghena karaṇaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.19_0: Ukkujjito saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto, sambhogo saṅghena.
pli-tv-kd15:20.7.20_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena bhaggā tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.2_0: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena bhaggā tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena bodhissa rājakumārassa kokanado nāma pāsādo acirakārito hoti,
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.4_1: anajjhāvuttho samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenaci vā manussabhūtena.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.5_0: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro sañcikāputtaṁ māṇavaṁ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.6_0: “ehi tvaṁ, samma sañcikāputta, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama,
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.6_1: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vanda;
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.7_0: appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ puccha—
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.8_2: appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.10_1: bhagavā bodhissa rājakumārassa svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.11_1: bho”ti kho sañcikāputto māṇavo bodhissa rājakumārassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.11_3: sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.12_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho sañcikāputto māṇavo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.13_0: “bodhi kho rājakumāro bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati,
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.13_1: appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchati.
pli-tv-kd15:21.1.15_0: ‘adhivāsetu kira bhavaṁ gotamo bodhissa rājakumārassa svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.1_0: Atha kho sañcikāputto māṇavo bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bodhi rājakumāro tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.2_0: “avocumha kho mayaṁ bhoto vacanena taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.3_0: ‘bodhi kho rājakumāro bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati,
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.3_1: appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchati.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.5_0: adhivāsetu kira bhavaṁ gotamo bodhissa rājakumārassa svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā’ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.7_0: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā,
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.7_1: kokanadañca pāsādaṁ odātehi dussehi santharāpetvā yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarā,
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.8_0: “ehi tvaṁ, samma sañcikāputta, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama,
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.10_1: bho”ti kho sañcikāputto māṇavo bodhissa rājakumārassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.12_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena bodhissa rājakumārassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.13_0: Tena kho pana samayena bodhi rājakumāro bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhito hoti, bhagavantaṁ āgamayamāno.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.14_0: Addasā kho bodhi rājakumāro bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.15_0: Disvāna tato paccuggantvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā purekkhatvā yena kokanado pāsādo tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.16_0: Atha kho bhagavā pacchimasopānakaḷevaraṁ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.17_0: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.18_0: “akkamatu, bhante, bhagavā dussāni, akkamatu sugato dussāni,
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.18_1: yaṁ mama assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.21_0: tatiyampi kho bodhi rājakumāro bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.22_0: “akkamatu, bhante, bhagavā dussāni, akkamatu sugato dussāni,
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.22_1: yaṁ mama assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.23_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ apalokesi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.24_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bodhiṁ rājakumāraṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.2.26_0: Na bhagavā celapaṭikaṁ akkamissati pacchimaṁ janataṁ tathāgato anukampatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.1_0: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro dussāni saṁharāpetvā uparikokanade pāsāde āsanaṁ paññapesi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā kokanadaṁ pāsādaṁ abhiruhitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.3_0: Atha kho bodhi rājakumāro buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā,
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.4_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho bodhiṁ rājakumāraṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:21.3.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī apagatagabbhā bhikkhū nimantetvā dussaṁ paññapetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.6_0: Atha kho sā itthī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.7_0: “kathañhi nāma ayyā maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānā celapaṭikaṁ na akkamissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.8_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassā itthiyā ujjhāyantiyā khiyyantiyā vipācentiyā.
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.9_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:21.4.12_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dhotapādakaṁ akkamituṁ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā bhaggesu yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.2_0: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.4_0: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā ghaṭakañca katakañca sammajjaniñca ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.5_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho visākhā migāramātā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.6_2: yaṁ mama assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.9_0: Atha kho bhagavā visākhaṁ migāramātaraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.10_0: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd15:22.1.11_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:22.2.1_0: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā vidhūpanañca tālavaṇṭañca ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:22.2.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho visākhā migāramātā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:22.2.3_2: yaṁ mama assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:22.2.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā visākhaṁ migāramātaraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:22.2.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:23.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa makasabījanī uppannā hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa chattaṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattappaggahitā āhiṇḍanti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako sambahulehi ājīvakasāvakehi saddhiṁ uyyānaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.6_0: Addasāsuṁ kho te ājīvakasāvakā chabbaggiye bhikkhū dūratova chattappaggahite āgacchante.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.8_0: “ete kho ayyā tumhākaṁ bhadantā chattappaggahitā āgacchanti,
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.11_0: Atha kho so upāsako upagate sañjānitvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.13_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-kd15:23.2.14_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:23.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.3.2_0: Tassa bhikkhuno vinā chattaṁ na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:23.4.2_0: gilānasseva bhagavatā chattaṁ anuññātaṁ no agilānassāti—
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sikkāya pattaṁ uṭṭitvā daṇḍe ālaggetvā vikāle aññatarena gāmadvārena atikkamati.
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.3_1: asissa vijjotalatī”ti anupatitvā gahetvā sañjānitvā muñciṁsu.
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.4_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:24.1.9_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti,
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.5_0: Tena gilānena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.21_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno daṇḍasammutiyā dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd15:24.2.24_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti,
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.1_1: na sakkoti vinā sikkāya pattaṁ pariharituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.5_0: Tena gilānena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.7_0: na sakkomi vinā sikkāya pattaṁ pariharituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.13_1: na sakkoti vinā sikkāya pattaṁ pariharituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.18_1: na sakkoti vinā sikkāya pattaṁ pariharituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.21_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sikkāsammutiyā dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.24_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.25_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti,
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.25_2: na sakkoti vinā sikkāya pattaṁ pariharituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.29_0: Tena gilānena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.32_0: na sakkomi vinā sikkāya pattaṁ pariharituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.38_2: na sakkoti vinā sikkāya pattaṁ pariharituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.43_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu gilāno na sakkoti vinā daṇḍena āhiṇḍituṁ,
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.43_1: na sakkoti vinā sikkāya pattaṁ pariharituṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.46_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno daṇḍasikkāsammutiyā dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd15:24.3.49_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:25.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu romanthako hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghabhattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā odane diyyamāne na sakkaccaṁ paṭiggahessanti,
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:26.1.6_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu dīghehi nakhehi piṇḍāya carati.
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.2_0: Aññatarā itthī passitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.5_1: idānāhaṁ attano nakhehi gattāni vilikhitvā kuppaṁ karissāmi—
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.8_0: Atha kho sā itthī attano nakhehi gattāni vilikhitvā kuppaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.11_0: Addasāsuṁ kho te manussā tassā itthiyā nakhe chavimpi lohitampi.
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.15_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.16_0: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso, dīghe nakhe dhāresī”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.18_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:27.1.20_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:27.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū nakhenapi nakhaṁ chindanti, mukhenapi nakhaṁ chindanti, kuṭṭepi ghaṁsanti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.2.8_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vīsatimaṭṭhaṁ kārāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṁ kesā dīghā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.3.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:27.3.7_1: khuraṁ khurasilaṁ khurasipāṭikaṁ namatakaṁ sabbaṁ khurabhaṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū massuṁ kappāpenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:27.4.21_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno sambādhe vaṇo hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kattarikāya kese chedāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.7_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno sīse vaṇo hoti,
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.10_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dīghāni nāsikālomāni dhārenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.16_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sakkharikāyapi madhusitthakenapi nāsikālomaṁ gāhāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.5.20_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū palitaṁ gāhāpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno kaṇṇagūthakehi kaṇṇā thakitā honti.
pli-tv-kd15:27.6.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacā kaṇṇamalaharaṇiyo dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṁ rūpiyamayaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:27.6.10_1: aṭṭhimayaṁ dantamayaṁ visāṇamayaṁ naḷamayaṁ veḷumayaṁ kaṭṭhamayaṁ jatumayaṁ phalamayaṁ lohamayaṁ saṅkhanābhimayan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahuṁ lohabhaṇḍaṁ kaṁsabhaṇḍaṁ sannicayaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.1.2_0: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd15:28.1.3_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bahuṁ lohabhaṇḍaṁ kaṁsabhaṇḍaṁ sannicayaṁ karissanti,
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū añjanimpi añjanisalākampi kaṇṇamalaharaṇimpi bandhanamattampi kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdanti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.9_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.10_0: Tassa vinā āyogena na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:28.2.16_1: tantakaṁ vemaṁ kavaṭaṁ salākaṁ sabbaṁ tantabhaṇḍakan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu akāyabandhano gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd15:29.1.5_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:29.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacāni kāyabandhanāni dhārenti—
pli-tv-kd15:29.2.17_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace vidhe dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṁ rūpiyamayaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando lahukā saṅghāṭiyo pārupitvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.6_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvacā gaṇṭhikāyo dhārenti sovaṇṇamayaṁ rūpiyamayaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.12_1: aṭṭhimayaṁ dantamayaṁ visāṇamayaṁ naḷamayaṁ veḷumayaṁ kaṭṭhamayaṁ jatumayaṁ phalamayaṁ lohamayaṁ saṅkhanābhimayaṁ suttamayan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.13_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gaṇṭhikampi pāsakampi cīvare appenti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.3.21_0: pāsakaphalakaṁ sattaṅgulaṁ vā aṭṭhaṅgulaṁ vā ogāhetvā appetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihinivatthaṁ nivāsenti—
pli-tv-kd15:29.4.9_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihipārutaṁ pārupanti.
pli-tv-kd15:29.5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṁvelliyaṁ nivāsenti.
pli-tv-kd15:30.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ubhatokājaṁ haranti.
pli-tv-kd15:30.1.7_1: ekatokājaṁ antarākājaṁ sīsabhāraṁ khandhabhāraṁ kaṭibhāraṁ olambakan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dantakaṭṭhaṁ na khādanti.
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.5_0: Acakkhussaṁ, mukhaṁ duggandhaṁ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo na visujjhanti,
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.5_1: pittaṁ semhaṁ bhattaṁ pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchādeti—
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.8_0: Cakkhussaṁ, mukhaṁ na duggandhaṁ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo visujjhanti,
pli-tv-kd15:31.1.8_1: pittaṁ semhaṁ bhattaṁ na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chādeti—
pli-tv-kd15:31.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dīghāni dantakaṭṭhāni khādanti, teheva sāmaṇeraṁ ākoṭenti.
pli-tv-kd15:31.2.7_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno atimaṭāhakaṁ dantakaṭṭhaṁ khādantassa kaṇṭhe vilaggaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dāyaṁ ālimpenti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.1.7_0: Tena kho pana samayena vihārā tiṇagahanā honti,
pli-tv-kd15:32.1.8_0: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyanti paṭaggiṁ dātuṁ, parittaṁ kātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:32.1.10_1: davaḍāhe ḍayhamāne paṭaggiṁ dātuṁ, parittaṁ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū rukkhaṁ abhiruhanti, rukkhā rukkhaṁ saṅkamanti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.7_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṁ gacchantassa antarāmagge hatthī pariyuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.8_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu rukkhamūlaṁ upadhāvitvā kukkuccāyanto rukkhaṁ na abhiruhi.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.10_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd15:32.2.12_1: sati karaṇīye porisaṁ rukkhaṁ abhiruhituṁ āpadāsu yāvadatthan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena yameḷakekuṭā nāma bhikkhū dve bhātikā honti brāhmaṇajātikā kalyāṇavācā kalyāṇavākkaraṇā.
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.4_1: bhikkhū nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā.
pli-tv-kd15:33.1.8_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, evaṁ vakkhatha—
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū lokāyataṁ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.4_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.5_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.6_1: lokāyate sāradassāvī imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.8_0: “Imasmiṁ vā pana dhammavinaye sāradassāvī lokāyataṁ pariyāpuṇeyyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.12_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū lokāyataṁ vācenti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.18_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tiracchānavijjaṁ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.2.24_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tiracchānavijjaṁ vācenti.
pli-tv-kd15:33.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṁ desento khipi.
pli-tv-kd15:33.3.8_1: khipite ‘jīvā’ti vutto tappaccayā jīveyya vā mareyya vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:33.3.12_0: Tena kho pana samayena manussā bhikkhūnaṁ khipite “jīvatha, bhante”ti vadanti.
pli-tv-kd15:34.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṁ desento nisinno hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:34.1.6_0: Addasā kho bhagavā taṁ bhikkhuṁ ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ.
pli-tv-kd15:34.1.8_0: “kiṁ nu kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ekamantaṁ nisinno”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:34.1.13_1: yaṁ khāditvā evarūpāya dhammakathāya paribāhiyo assā”ti?
pli-tv-kd15:34.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa udaravātābādho hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:34.2.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd15:35.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ārāme tahaṁ tahaṁ passāvaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ārāme tahaṁ tahaṁ vaccaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.2.21_1: santharitvā majjhe chiddaṁ katvā vaccaṁ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.3.9_0: Ajjhokāse vaccaṁ karontā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:35.3.12_1: kavāṭaṁ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṁ udukkhalikaṁ uttarapāsakaṁ aggaḷavaṭṭiṁ kapisīsakaṁ sūcikaṁ ghaṭikaṁ tāḷacchiddaṁ āviñchanacchiddaṁ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.3.15_0: setavaṇṇaṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ gerukaparikammaṁ mālākammaṁ latākammaṁ makaradantakaṁ pañcapaṭikaṁ cīvaravaṁsaṁ cīvararajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.3.16_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu jarādubbalo vaccaṁ katvā vuṭṭhahanto paripatati.
pli-tv-kd15:35.4.4_1: kavāṭaṁ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭaṁ udukkhalikaṁ uttarapāsakaṁ aggaḷavaṭṭiṁ kapisīsakaṁ sūcikaṁ ghaṭikaṁ tāḷacchiddaṁ āviñchanacchiddaṁ āviñchanarajjun”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:35.4.7_0: setavaṇṇaṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ gerukaparikammaṁ mālākammaṁ latākammaṁ makaradantakaṁ pañcapaṭikan”ti.
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpaṁ anācāraṁ ācaranti—
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.2_0: mālāvacchaṁ ropentipi ropāpentipi, siñcantipi siñcāpentipi, ocinantipi ocināpentipi, ganthentipi ganthāpentipi,
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.3_0: Te kulitthīnaṁ kuladhītānaṁ kulakumārīnaṁ kulasuṇhānaṁ kuladāsīnaṁ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harantipi harāpentipi,
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.4_0: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṁ ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti, ekathālakepi pivanti, ekāsanepi nisīdanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti,
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.4_1: ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, vikālepi bhuñjanti, majjampi pivanti,
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.4_2: mālāgandhavilepanampi dhārenti, naccantipi, gāyantipi, vādentipi, lāsentipi;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.5_0: naccantiyāpi naccanti, naccantiyāpi gāyanti, naccantiyāpi vādenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.6_0: lāsentiyāpi naccanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyanti, lāsentiyāpi vādenti, lāsentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.7_0: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷanti, dasapadepi kīḷanti, ākāsepi kīḷanti, parihārapathepi kīḷanti, santikāyapi kīḷanti, khalikāyapi kīḷanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷanti, akkhenapi kīḷanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷanti, mokkhacikāyapi kīḷanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷanti, rathakenapi kīḷanti, dhanukenapi kīḷanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷanti, manesikāyapi kīḷanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷanti;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.8_0: hatthismimpi sikkhanti, assasmimpi sikkhanti, rathasmimpi sikkhanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhanti;
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.10_0: hatthissapi purato dhāvanti, assassapi purato dhāvanti,
pli-tv-kd15:36.1.12_0: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṁ pattharitvā naccakiṁ evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd15:37.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmante uruvelakassape pabbajite saṅghassa bahuṁ lohabhaṇḍaṁ dārubhaṇḍaṁ mattikābhaṇḍaṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd15:37.1.3_0: “kiṁ nu kho bhagavatā lohabhaṇḍaṁ anuññātaṁ, kiṁ ananuññātaṁ;
pli-tv-kd15:37.1.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd15:37.1.8_2: ṭhapetvā āsandiṁ pallaṅkaṁ dārupattaṁ dārupādukaṁ sabbaṁ dārubhaṇḍaṁ,
